form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Stabenow (for herself, Mr. Burr, Mrs. Shaheen, Ms. Ayotte, Mr. Peters, Mr. Wicker, Mr. Nelson, Mr. Cochran, Mr. Warner, and Mr. Moran) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To provide predictability and certainty in the tax law, create jobs, and encourage investment.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Motorsports Fairness and Permanency Act.

section.header: 7-year class life for motorsports entertainment complex facilities made permanent

subsection.text: Section 168(i)(15) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (D).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2014.
